channel.title: AlloyDB for PostgreSQL on MCP Toolbox for Databases
channel.description: Recent content in AlloyDB for PostgreSQL on MCP Toolbox for Databases

item.title: alloydb-pg-list-clusters
item.description:
About

The alloydb-pg-list-clusters tool retrieves AlloyDB cluster information for all or specified locations in a given project.

alloydb-pg-list-clusters tool lists the detailed information of AlloyDB cluster(cluster name, state, configuration, etc) for a given project and location. The tool takes the following input parameters: * project : The GCP project ID to list clusters for. * location (optional): The location to list clusters in (e.g., ‘us-central1’). Use ‘-’ to list clusters across all locations. Default: "-".
